original_title: Disney's Animal Kingdom: Alive with Magic
overview: Embark on a wild expedition through Disney's Animal Kingdom in this extraordinary all-access special. Experience Walt Disney World's largest theme park as we journey from day to night, discovering close-up encounters with wild animals, meeting the passionate keepers who care for them, and unveil thrilling new adventures brought to life by Walt Disney Imagineering.
title: Disney's Animal Kingdom: Alive with Magic
